00065 #define _doublemagicroundeps          (.5-1.4e-11)

00067 double tgf::RandomDouble()
00068 {
00069         MersenneTwister* rand = 0;
00070         static bool firstRandomDouble = true;
00071         
00072         if ( firstRandomDouble )
00073         {
00074                 rand = new MersenneTwister();
00075                 firstRandomDouble = false;
00076         }
00077         return rand->RandomDouble();
00078 }

00080 double tgf::Radians(double deg) 
00081 {
00082         return (tgc::Pi/180.0) * deg;
00083 }

00085 bool tgf::IsPowerOf2(int v) 
00086 {
00087         return (v & (v - 1)) == 0;
00088 }

00090 int tgf::Round2Int( double val ) 
00091 {
00092         #ifdef FAST_INT
00093         #define _doublemagic                    double (6755399441055744.0)
00094         //2^52 * 1.5,  uses limited precision to floor
00095                 val             = val + _doublemagic;
00096                 return ((long*)&val)[0];
00097         #else
00098                 return int (val+_doublemagicroundeps);
00099         #endif
00100 }
00101 
00102 int tgf::Log2Int( float v ) 
00103 {
00104         return ((*(int *) &v) >> 23) - 127;
00105 }
00106 
00107 bool tgf::Quadratic( double A, double B, double C, double *t0, double *t1)
00108 {
00109         // Find discriminant
00110         double discrim = B*B - 4.0*A*C;
00111         if (discrim < 0.) return false;
00112         
00113         // Compute quadratic root values
00114         double q = -0.5;
00115         if ( B < 0 ) q *= B - sqrt( discrim );
00116         else q *= B + sqrt( discrim ) ;
00117         *t0 = q / A;
00118         *t1 = C / q;
00119         if(*t0 > *t1) std::swap( *t0, *t1 );
00120         return true;
00121 }
00122 
00123 void tgf::ConcentricSampleDisk( double u1, double u2, double *dx, double *dy ) 
00124 {
00125         double r, theta;
00126         // Map uniform random numbers to $[-1,1]^2$
00127         double sx = 2 * u1 - 1;
00128         double sy = 2 * u2 - 1;
00129         // Map square to $(r,\theta)$
00130         // Handle degeneracy at the origin
00131         if (sx == 0.0 && sy == 0.0) 
00132         {
00133                 *dx = 0.0;
00134                 *dy = 0.0;
00135                 return;
00136         }
00137         if (sx >= -sy) 
00138         {
00139                 if (sx > sy) 
00140                 {
00141                         // Handle first region of disk
00142                         r = sx;
00143                         if (sy > 0.0)
00144                                 theta = sy/r;
00145                         else
00146                                 theta = 8.0 + sy/r;
00147                 }
00148                 else 
00149                 {
00150                         // Handle second region of disk
00151                         r = sy;
00152                         theta = 2.0 - sx/r;
00153                 }
00154         }
00155         else 
00156         {
00157                 if (sx <= sy) 
00158                 {
00159                         // Handle third region of disk
00160                         r = -sx;
00161                         theta = 4.0 - sy/r;
00162                 }
00163                 else {
00164                         // Handle fourth region of disk
00165                         r = -sy;
00166                         theta = 6.0f + sx/r;
00167                 }
00168         }
00169         theta *= M_PI / 4.;
00170         *dx = r*cos(theta);
00171         *dy = r*sin(theta);
00172 }
00173 
00174 Vector3D tgf::CosineSampleHemisphere( double u1, double u2 ) 
00175 {
00176         Vector3D ret;
00177         ConcentricSampleDisk( u1, u2, &ret.x, &ret.y );
00178         ret.z = sqrt( std::max( 0., 1. - ret.x*ret.x - ret.y*ret.y ) );
00179         return ret;
00180 }
00181 
00182 bool tgf::SameHemisphere( const Vector3D &w, const Vector3D &wp ) 
00183 {
00184         return w.z * wp.z > 0.0;
00185 }
00186 
00187 Vector3D tgf::UniformSampleHemisphere( double u1, double u2) 
00188 {
00189         double z = u1;
00190         double r = sqrt(std::max(0.0, 1.0 - z*z));
00191         double phi = 2 * tgc::Pi * u2;
00192         double x = r * cos( phi );
00193         double y = r * sin( phi );
00194         return Vector3D(x, y, z);
00195 }

00208 double tgf::Clamp( double val, double low, double high ) 
00209 {
00210         if ( val < low ) return low;
00211         else if ( val > high ) return high;
00212         else return val;

00222 double tgf::CosTheta( const Vector3D &w) 
00223 { 
00224         return w.z; 
00225 }
00226 
00227 double tgf::SinTheta( const Vector3D &w ) 
00228 {
00229         return sqrt( std::max( 0.0, 1.0 - w.z*w.z ) );
00230 }
00231 
00232 double tgf::SinTheta2( const Vector3D &w ) 
00233 {
00234         return 1.0 - CosTheta(w)*CosTheta(w);
00235 }
00236 
00237 double tgf::CosPhi(const Vector3D &w) 
00238 {
00239         return w.x / SinTheta(w);
00240 }
00241 
00242 double tgf::SinPhi(const Vector3D &w) 
00243 {
00244         return w.y / SinTheta(w);
00245 }

00247 void tgf::BuildFileList( QDir parentDirectory, QStringList& fileList )
00248 {       
00249     QString parentDirectoryPath( parentDirectory.absolutePath().append( "/" ) );
00250     
00251     foreach( QString fileName, parentDirectory.entryList( QDir::Files, QDir::Unsorted ) ) 
00252     {
00253         fileList << parentDirectoryPath + fileName;
00254     }
00255     
00256     foreach( QString directoryName, parentDirectory.entryList( QDir::Dirs, QDir::Unsorted ) )
00257         {       
00258                 if( ( directoryName != "." ) && ( directoryName!= ".." ) )
00259                 {
00260                         QDir subdirectory( parentDirectoryPath + directoryName );
00261                         BuildFileList( subdirectory, fileList );
00262                 }
00263         }
00264 }

00266 void tgf::TraceRay( Ray& ray, InstanceNode* instanceNode, PhotonMap& photonMap, RandomDeviate& rand)
00267 {
00268         Trace trace( "tgf::TraceRay", false );
00269         
00270         Ray* reflectedRay = 0;
00271         Photon* node = new Photon( ray.origin, 0, 0 );
00272         Photon* next = 0;
00273         
00274         TSeparatorKit* coinNode = dynamic_cast< TSeparatorKit* > ( instanceNode->GetNode() );
00275         
00276         //Trace the ray
00277         bool intersection = true;       
00278         while ( intersection )
00279         {       
00280                 reflectedRay = coinNode->Intersect( ray, rand );
00281                                 
00282                 if( reflectedRay )
00283                 {       
00284                         Point3D point = ray( ray.maxt );
00285                         
00286                         next = new Photon( point, node, 0 );
00287                         node->m_next = next;         
00288                         photonMap.store(node);
00289                         node = next;
00290                         
00291                         //Prepare node and ray for next iteration
00292                         ray = *reflectedRay;
00293                         delete reflectedRay;
00294                 }
00295                 else intersection = false;
00296         }
00297 
00298         if( ray.maxt == HUGE_VAL  ) ray.maxt = 1.0;
00299         
00300         Point3D endOfRay = ray( ray.maxt );
00301         Photon* lastNode = new Photon( endOfRay, node, 0 );
00302         node->m_next = lastNode;  
00303         photonMap.store( node );        
00304         photonMap.store( lastNode );
00305 }

00307 bool tgf::IsOdd( int number )
00308 {
00309         bool answer = number & 1;
00310         return answer;
00311 }

00314 double tgf::computeSigmaOptica( double sigmaSlope, double sigmaSpecularity )
00315 {
00316         //Computes the overall standard deviation of a reflective surface in milliradiands in terms of 
00317         //the corresponding standard deviations of the slope and specularity errors
00318         return sqrt( 4*( sigmaSlope*sigmaSlope ) + ( sigmaSpecularity*sigmaSpecularity ) ) / 1000;              
00319 }

00321 SoSeparator* tgf::DrawPhotonMapPoints( const PhotonMap& map )
00322 {       
00323         Trace trace( "tgf::DrawPhotonMapPoints", true );
00324         SoSeparator* drawpoints=new SoSeparator;
00325         SoCoordinate3* points = new SoCoordinate3;
00326         
00327         for( unsigned long i = 0 ; i < map.StoredPhotons(); i++ )
00328         {
00329                 Point3D photon = map.GetPhoton(i)->m_pos;
00330                 points->point.set1Value( i, photon.x, photon.y, photon.z );
00331         }
00332 
00333         SoMaterial* myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00334         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00335         drawpoints->addChild(myMaterial);       
00336         drawpoints->addChild(points);
00337 
00338         SoDrawStyle* drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00339         drawstyle->pointSize = 3;
00340         drawpoints->addChild(drawstyle);
00341         
00342         SoPointSet* pointset = new SoPointSet;
00343         drawpoints->addChild(pointset);
00344 
00345         return drawpoints;
00346 }

00348 SoSeparator* tgf::DrawPhotonMapRays( const PhotonMap& map, unsigned long numberOfRays, double fraction )
00349 {
00350         Trace trace( "tgf::DrawPhotonMapRays", false );
00351         SoSeparator* drawrays = new SoSeparator;
00352         SoCoordinate3* points = new SoCoordinate3;
00353         
00354         unsigned long drawRays = (unsigned long) ( numberOfRays * ( fraction / 100 ) );
00355         if( drawRays == 0 ) drawRays = 1;
00356         unsigned long ray = 0;
00357         int lines[drawRays];
00358         
00359         unsigned long rayLength = 0;
00360         unsigned long drawnRay = 0;
00361         
00362         unsigned long numberOfPhoton = 0;
00363         
00364         for( unsigned long i = 1; i<= map.StoredPhotons(); i++ )
00365         {
00366                 if ( !map.GetPhoton(i)->m_prev )
00367                 {
00368                         if ( ray % ( numberOfRays/drawRays ) == 0 )
00369                         {
00370                                 Photon* node = map.GetPhoton(i);
00371                                 rayLength = 0;
00372                                 
00373                                 while ( node )
00374                                 {       
00375                                     Point3D photon = node->m_pos;
00376                                         points->point.set1Value( numberOfPhoton, photon.x, photon.y, photon.z );
00377                                         node = node->m_next;
00378                                         rayLength++;
00379                                         numberOfPhoton++;
00380                                 }
00381                 
00382                                 lines[drawnRay]= rayLength;
00383                                 drawnRay++;
00384 
00385                         }
00386                         ray++;
00387                 }
00388         }
00389         
00390         SoMaterial* myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00391         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 1.0, 0.8); 
00392         drawrays->addChild( myMaterial );
00393     drawrays->addChild( points );
00394         
00395         SoLineSet* lineset = new SoLineSet;
00396         lineset->numVertices.setValues( 0, drawnRay, lines );
00397         drawrays->addChild( lineset );
00398 
00399         return drawrays;
00400 }
00401 
00402 double tgf::AlternateBoxMuller( RandomDeviate& rand )
00403 {
00404         static bool firsttime = true;
00405         static double x1;
00406         static double x2;
00407         
00408         if (firsttime)
00409         {
00410                 double s = 2;
00411                 double u1;
00412                 double u2;
00413                 while(s > 1)
00414                 {
00415                         u1 = 2 * rand.RandomDouble( ) - 1;
00416                         u2 = 2 * rand.RandomDouble( ) - 1;
00417                         s = u1 * u1 + u2 * u2;
00418                 }
00419                 
00420                 double z = sqrt( -2 * log( s ) / s );
00421                 x1 = z * u1;
00422                 x2 = z * u2;
00423                 
00424                 firsttime = false;
00425                 return x1;
00426         }
00427         else
00428         {
00429                 firsttime = true;
00430                 return x2;
00431         }
00432         
00433 
00434 }
